data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: During the prosperity of the 1960s, Fairmount enjoyed a time of building with a new town hall, water works, post office and elementary school. At ____ end ____ the ____ the ____ school ____ merged ____ a ____ one, forming ____ Madison-Grant ____ school ____. A ____ high ____ was ____ for ____ district, and Fairmount High School became a middle ____. When a new junior high school was opened in 1986, the Fairmount High School building was permanently closed.
data.partBlankContent: During the prosperity of the 1960s, Fairmount enjoyed a time of building with a new town hall, water works, post office and elementary school. At t__ end o_ the dec___ the lo___ school dist____ merged wi__ a neigh______ one, forming t__ Madison-Grant uni___ school dist____. A n__ high sch___ was bu___ for th__ district, and Fairmount High School became a middle sch___. When a new junior high school was opened in 1986, the Fairmount High School building was permanently closed.
data.answer: 在20世纪60年代的繁荣时期，费尔蒙特拥有一个新的市政厅、供水设施、邮局和小学。20世纪末，当地的学区与邻近的学区合并，形成了麦迪逊-格兰特联合学区。在这个地区建了一所新的高中，费尔蒙特高中变成了一所中学。1986年，当一所新的初中开学时，费尔蒙特高中大楼被永久关闭。
